category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_Indexable_File_Extensions
preference.preference_description: Lists file extensions only allowed for text content extraction during search indexing. Valid values are file extension names (e.g. ".txt", ".doc"). If no value is specified, the extensions listed under the BMIDE global constant "Awp0IndexableFileTypes" will be used.
